name: Clients - Create (client_create) → Postgres Direct → Respond

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO client_finals (id, tenant_id, type, raison_sociale, nom, prenom, email, telephone, adresse, statut, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  gen_random_uuid(),
  $1::uuid,
  $2::"ClientFinalType",
  NULLIF($3, ''),
  $4,
  $5,
  $6,
  $7,
  NULLIF($8, ''),
  'actif',
  NOW(), NOW()
)
ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, email) DO UPDATE SET
  nom = EXCLUDED.nom, prenom = EXCLUDED.prenom, telephone = EXCLUDED.telephone,
  raison_sociale = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.raison_sociale, ''), client_finals.raison_sociale),
  adresse = COALESCE(NULLIF(EXCLUDED.adresse, ''), client_finals.adresse),
  updated_at = NOW()
RETURNING id, tenant_id, type, raison_sociale, nom, prenom, email, telephone, adresse, statut, created_at, updated_at

_comment: Converted from HTTP Request to Postgres Direct on 2026-02-21. Enum ClientFinalType = b2b|b2c (not particulier). Tested OK.
